name: Bird Stack Jump
description:
The best block Stacks game named "Bird Stack Jump".
bounce on stack and pile up highest score as u can to build the vast tower!
upgrade to your high score in illimitable style.
incredible & wrathful graphics are designed

-optimizations of tactics
-Trifling fixes and tweaks
-Challenges & Threats are now more smooth
-bug fixes
- Make Highest Score for Leaderboard

Feel Free to give us positive feedback by rating 5 stars.
